thread.title: Design and dictatorship: exhibition celebrates North Korean graphics

title: Design and dictatorship: exhibition celebrates North Korean graphics
text:
Design and dictatorship: exhibition celebrates North Korean graphics 6:21pm GMT - 01:13 
''Made in North Korea: Everyday Graphics from the DPRK'' features government propaganda posters and comics, as well as tems such as food packaging, ticket stubs and stamps. Rough cut (no reporter narration)
